titles.title: Ban Birth Tourism Act of 2020
Ban Birth Tourism Act of 2020
A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for inadmissibility for certain aliens seeking citizenship for children by giving birth in the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Ban Birth Tourism Act of 2020
This bill provides statutory authority for the ban on admitting an alien into the United States as a nonimmigrant if the alien's primary purpose for entering is to give birth to a child in the United States in order to obtain U.S. citizenship for that child.
